page.title: 08Horsmonden School Functions
page.content: The main school function of the year is Family Day when people come to the school field and there are stalls, sponsored events, displays of dancing and gymnastics. On Sports Day all the parents come to watch and the children race against each other. Every Summer for the District Sports all the schools in the Weald district go to one school to race. This year it was at Marden. There are three football and netball rallies in a year. For the Music Festival a lot of schools get together at Cranbrook and sing and play instruments to an audience. The Drama Festival is when a few schools in our district come to our school and entertain each other with plays. A school pantomime is always held at Christmas in which all the teachers and juniors take part.
